flawed_nl_solution:
Mr. Salazar had 7 x 12 = <<7*12=84>>84 oranges.
He reserved 84 x 1/4 = <<84*1/4=21>>21 oranges for his friend.
Ha had 84 - 21 = <<84-21=68>>68 oranges to be sold yesterday.
But only 68 x 3/7 = <<68*3/7=204/7>>204/7 oranges were sold yesterday.
So, he had 68 - 204/7 = <<68-204/7=272/7>>272/7 oranges left.
Since four oranges are rotten, then only 272/7 - 4 = <<272/7-4=244/7>>244/7 oranges are left to be sold today.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 63, not 68. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
